messages.messageText: What are your choices when someone puts a gun to your head?
messages.createdDate: Sun Jun 22 2018 10:59:02 GMT+0200 (Eastern European Standard Time)
messages.modifiedDate: Sun Jun 22 2018 10:59:02 GMT+0200 (Eastern European Standard Time)

messages.messageText: What are you talking about? You do what they say or they shoot you.
messages.createdDate: Sat Aug 27 2018 11:42:02 GMT+0200 (Eastern European Standard Time)
messages.modifiedDate: Sat Aug 27 2018 11:42:02 GMT+0200 (Eastern European Standard Time)

messages.messageText: Wrong. You take the gun, or you pull out a bigger one. Or, you call their bluff. Or, you do any one of hundred and forty six other things.
